name: Simless Inc
description: Developer of a communication platform for selecting and switching cellular networks designed to simplify cellular services. The company's communication platform connect devices to different cellular networks without keeping any requirements to purchase, manage and swap multiple subscriber identity module cards, enabling mobile operators, device manufacturers and subscribers to avail affordable and reliable connectivity services.
one_liner: Developer of a communication platform for selecting and switching cellular networks designed to simplify cellular services. The company's communication platform connect devices to different cellular networks without keeping any requirements to purchase, manage and swap multiple subscriber identity module cards, enabling mobile operators, device manufacturers and subscribers to avail affordable and reliable connectivity services.
